author: By Rich Lowry
title: Blaming the WHO and China Is Not Scapegoating
description: Trump takes more than his share of potshots, but that doesn’t mean he’s always off the mark.
content:
Yet none of this detracts from the force of his critiques of China (although he blows hot and cold on that) and the WHO, which are at the center of this international catastrophe and must be held to account. 
Without Chinas deceit and WHOs solicitude for Bei… [+4390 chars]
